notes: Expected at least 3 tool calls, observed 0.
No successful read/list/search tool call observed.
No successful write tool call observed (write_file/replace/apply_patch).

critical_issues: All output files are empty JSON objects ({}) and therefore omit essentially all report content; this fails coverage and practical usefulness requirements.
Schema validity failures across all outputs (missing required fields like paper, core_question, findings, claims, headline, etc.) make the outputs unusable for downstream review.
Grounding/line-referencing requirement is not met: there are no claims and therefore no valid line references mapping to the numbered report lines.

Main quantitative findings are entirely missing (e.g., dayside brightness temperature 342±22 K [L27], heat transport efficiency epsilon 0.19 (+0.23/-0.14) [L28], Bond albedo <0.08 [L29], CO2 band depth 96 ppm [L30], likelihood ratio 7.4 [L31], preferred pressure scale 0.3–1.0 bar [L32]).

Core qualitative conclusions and caveats are absent (e.g., evidence against strictly airless interpretation [L35, L52-L53]; O2-rich not ruled out [L36]; degeneracies and retrieval/systematics concerns [L37-L50]).
value.summary: The generated outputs contain no extracted information (all are {}). While they avoid fabricating claims, they fail the task because they do not capture any of the report’s findings, uncertainties, or line-grounded claims, and they are schema-invalid and not practically useful.
